name: true-travel-backend
description: Backend microservices for True Travel B2B booking platform

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:booking" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:payment"
scripts.build: npm run build:gateway && npm run build:booking && npm run build:user && npm run build:payment
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd services/api-gateway && npm install && cd ../booking-service && npm install && cd ../user-service && npm install && cd ../payment-service && npm install

author: True Travel
